ee arthayen aanduka්rama wyawasthawa purawasiyan thaman palanaya wiyayuthu aakaraya gana athi karaganna giwisumak lesada salakiya hakiya.aanduka්rama wyawasthawak thibena awasthawakadi ema wyawasthawa ahosi kota nawa wyawasthawak athikara ganimata darana uthsahayak rajyaya nawatha pa්rathinirmanaya karaganima sandaha darana uthsahayak lesa salakiya hakiya.nawa wyawasthawak ayi?apata aanduka්rama wyawasthawak awashya wi thibenne ayida kiyana pa්rashnayata diya hakiwa thibena sarala pilithura meseya.thibena aanduka්rama wyawasthawa yatathe 1978di nawatha aluthen sakas kerunu rajyaya yahapath idiri darshanayak athiwa widhimath lesa ha mana galapimak athiwa sakas karana lada rajyayak nowiya.

ape mulu deshapalana ithihasayama siyumwa nirikshanaya karala baluwoth penewi ape wyayamaya hama thissema ba`dila thibune ratath ekka.rate abhipa්rayan ekka.rate aramunuth ekka.janatha wimukthi peramune inna kotath rata ismudune thiyagena thamayi api deshapalanaya kale.ethanin eliyata bahinna sidu wuneth rata rakina sankalpaya.ethan sitath api 2005 wenna puluwan,2010 jayaga්rahanayen pasuwa wenna puluwan,in anathuruwa wennath puluwan,2015 dith api ape rata mudune thiyagena thamayi deshapalanaya keruwe.pa්radhana washayenma dinagath rajya sthawarawa idiriyata gena yama,apita penuna 2010di ekathu wunu ee ashuddha hawula 2015 dith wenath swarupayakin karaliyata aawa.athirekawa eekata jathika hela urumaya wani sinhala bauddha swarupaye wes pala`da gaththu pirisa ekathu wuna.rajitha senarathna amathiwarayage ha`da patayak ee dawaswala rupawahiniyen pa්racharaya wuna.ehidi ohu kiyanawa owunge kumantha්ranaya mokakda kiyala.ee kumantha්ranaya api kal athiwa dakka.ee wagema aanduwa paththe thibunu ee kumantha්ranaya nodaka katayuthu kirime aduwak api ho`din therum aragena thibuna.
